clinical_study.brief_title: Post-operative Satisfaction With Glaucoma Surgery Trial
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized Trial of the Impact of Multifaceted Education on Post-operative Satisfaction With Glaucoma Surgery in Rural China

brief_summary.textblock:
1. Investigate degree of postoperative satisfaction in county level hospital glaucoma patients.
2. Investigate the effect of educational intervention affect the degree of satisfaction in glaucoma patients.
3. Investigate the effect factors of postoperative satisfaction.

detailed_description.textblock: Glaucoma is the leading cause irreversible blindness worldwide, but only less than 10% glaucoma patients were diagnosed in the country of Asia areas. In the country of China, patients who are low educational level and less known acknowledgement and information have less known glaucoma. In the help of the government and some international non-governmental organizations(NGOs), a lot of people in the country know the cataract, and the operability of cataract is increase. Because vision loss usually development after operation for glaucoma. If patients did not understand this, they may be not only do not accept operation, but also affect operability of cataract. We hope the educational intervention for glaucoma can increase the degree of satisfaction in glaucoma patients.

primary_outcome.measure: postoperative satisfaction rate in both group

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before surgery and after surgey 1 week and 6 weeks

secondary_outcome.description: The rate of willingness to recommend surgery
use Eysenck Personality Questionnaire-Revised Short Scale for Chinese(EPQ_RSC) access glaucoma patients personality

secondary_outcome.measure: intraocular pressure and visual acuity in both groups
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before surgery and after surgery 1week and 6 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: intraocular pressure and visual acuity in both groups

arm_group.description: Subjects will be asked to watch a 5-10 min film and participate in a 10-15 min pre-operative counseling session with a trained doctor/nurse. Subjects will also participate in a 5 min post-operative counseling session and follow up counseling after operation 1 week and 6 weeks
Subjects will be participate or not participate in pre-operative counseling and/or post-operative counseling with a rural hospital's doctor/nurse.

intervention.description: Subjects will be asked to watch a 5-10 min film and participate in a 10-15 min pre-operative counseling session with a trained doctor/nurse. Subjects will also participate in a 5 min post-operative counseling session.
Subjects will be not participate or participate in a pre-operative/post-operative counseling session with a rural hospital's doctor/nurse as usual traditional methods.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- age≥18 years, glaucoma patients who do the peripheral iridectomy or trabeculotomy
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients who had been the trabeculotomy, vision≤0.05, severe psychotic disorders and dysgnosia

responsible_party.investigator_title: Guangdong Educational Intervention for Rural Glaucoma surgical patient
